category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_NX_StructureSearch_SavedQueries
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of Saved Queries that can be used by the NX Structure Search functionality. The values are names of queries that are available in Teamcenter. The specified queries must return Item(s) or Item Revision(s).
